1.text: Steams of waters the heart of the king, in the hand of Jehovah: upon all which he shall delight in he will turn it.

2.text: Every way of a man right in his eyes: and Jehovah will prepare hearts.

3.text: To do justice and judgment was chosen by Jehovah above gold.

4.text: Lifting up the eyes and enlarging the heart, the light of the unjust is sin.

5.text: The purposes of the active only to abundance; and every one hastening only to want.

6.text: The making treasures by the tongue of falsehood is vanity scattered from those seeking death.

7.text: The violence of the unjust shall sweep them away, for they refuse to do judgment.

8.text: The way of man is crooked and strange: and the pure his work is right.

9.text: Good to dwell upon the corner of the roof rather than with a woman of strifes and a house of community.

10.text: The soul of the unjust one desired evil: his neighbor shall not be compassionated in his eyes.

11.text: In punishing him mocking, the simple shall become wise: and in instruction to the wise one he will take knowledge.

12.text: The just one being circumspect for the house of the unjust one: overthrowing the unjust for evil.

13.text: He stopping his ear from the cry of the poor one also himself shall call and shall not be answered.

14.text: Giving in secret will subdue anger: and a gift in the bosom, strong wrath.

15.text: Joy to the just one to do judgment: and destruction to those working iniquity.

16.text: A man wandering from the way of understanding shall rest in the convocation of the shades.

17.text: A man of poverty loving joy: he loving wine and oil shall not be rich.

18.text: The unjust one a ransom for the just one, and he transgressing, instead of the upright.

19.text: Good to dwell in the land of the desert rather than with a woman of contentions and anger.

20.text: A treasure desired, and oil in the house of the wise one; and the foolish man will swallow it down.

21.text: He pursuing justice and mercy shall find life, justice and honor.

22.text: The wise one ascended the city of the strong, and he will bring down the strength of its confidence.

23.text: He watching his mouth and his tongue watches his soul from straits.

24.text: Proud, arrogant, mocking, is his name doing in the wrath of pride.

25.text: The desire of the slothful shall kill him, for his hands refused to work,

26.text: He longed a longing all the day: and the just one shall give and not keep back.

27.text: The sacrifice of the unjust is an abomination, for also he will bring it in mischief.

28.text: A witness of lies shall perish: and a man hearing, shall speak clearly.

29.text: An unjust man strengthened with his face: and the upright he will prepare his ways.

30.text: No wisdom and no understanding, and no counsel against Jehovah.

31.text: The horse is prepared for the day of war and salvation is to Jehovah.
